Paper.Title: TRANSFORMATION OF NATURAL LANGUAGE INTO LOGICAL FORMULAS

Section.SectionTitle: TRANSFORMATION OF NATURAL LANGUAGE INTO LOGICAL FORMULAS
Section.Paragraph: This paper presents an attempt of elaboration of a full parsing system for Polish natural language which is being worked out in the Instlt~te of Informatics of Warsaw University. Our system was adapted to the parsing of the corpus of real medical texts whici= concern a subdomain of medicine. We made use of the experience of such famous authors as (6), (7), (8), (9), (10), (11), (12), (13), (1~).
